explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the co-movement and influencing factors of stock markets between India and other Asia-Pacific countries, using statistical and econometric methods such as unit root tests, DCC-GJR-GARCH, pooled OLS regression, and random effects models. There is no mention or application of machine learning techniques, neural networks, deep learning, or any other related keywords in the provided abstract. The study is grounded in financial econometrics and macroeconomic analysis, not in machine learning or artificial intelligence.
